title: Provincial officials to provide COVID-19 update
description: Up to 70 workers from a power services company in New Brunswick have told to self-isolate at home after restoring power in Maine over the last week.
content:
Up to 70 workers from a power services company in New Brunswick have been told to self-isolate at home after restoring power in Maine over the past week.  
Thousands of residents in Maine lost power for just over a week after a snow and wind storm. Utilities… [+6170 chars]
